alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:02PM CDT until June 21 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN DENTON COUNTY... At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sanger, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Denton, Corinth, Sanger, Prosper, Celina, Krum, Argyle, Shady Shores, Aubrey, Krugerville, Cross Roads, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Oak Point, Lincoln Park, Providence Village, Bolivar, Lake Ray Roberts and Lewisville Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
